name: Powerful Jewels Puzzle
description:
Experience endless fun,match 3 game
Play the most popular puzzle game of the century with powerful new gems. You’ll find cascades of fun as you test your gem-swapping ability!

Powerful Jewels Puzzle features:
- 8 major levels, and 36 smaller levels within each major level
- Easy to play, fun for all ages
- Abundant game props to help clear rows or columns of jewels, or those nearby
